Articles.Content:
Release the balanced Silisko edition version for this pack please =P

It\'s compatible already.
I am terribly confused as to why this is. Neither pod works with any form of RCS, except for translation. Harvester has some explaining to do.

I am terribly confused as to why this is. Neither pod works with any form of RCS, except for translation. Harvester has some explaining to do.

Isn\'t translation what the RCS does? Or is there some other function?

Anyways, I love this mod! Can you make it so the solar panels restore fuel? Or do they do that already?

Isn\'t translation what the RCS does? Or is there some other function?

Anyways, I love this mod! Can you make it so the solar panels restore fuel? Or do they do that already?

1. No, it assists with rotation too.

2. NEVER SUGGEST SUCH A THING AGAIN >:C

1. No, it assists with rotation too.

In theory, anyway. Doesn\'t do much of that right now.

1. No, it assists with rotation too.

2. NEVER SUGGEST SUCH A THING AGAIN >:C

1. Ah, I didn\'t even know that.

2. Why?
Solar panels store generator energy, not produce combustable liquid.

Solar panels store generator energy, not produce combustable liquid.

I get that, but IRL you don\'t put 15 boosters on a rocket now do you? =P

It\'s not totally realistic, I know. But it would be fun right?

Bussard Ramjet *caught*... Might mod it myself if I get time...

http://homepage.mac.com/joebergeron/webpageimages/bussard.jpg

I get that, but IRL you don\'t put 15 boosters on a rocket now do you? =P

It\'s not totally realistic, I know. But it would be fun right?

I\'m pretty sure this has come up on multiple threads before and been shot down on each subsequent thread. Probably not going to happen.
I might try to make my own mod for it, with some kind of a small engine like in this pack, whould that work?
Loving this pack. Could you add a small parachute? It seems wierd putting a command-pod sized parachute on a tiny satelite.
Satellites are supposed to orbit for eternity, not come back down. What do they need parachutes for?

Satellites are supposed to orbit for eternity, not come back down. What do they need parachutes for?

Sample returns of some sort. But, the current probe cores would never survive reentry... I might make a tiny aeroshell for sample returns.

Sample returns are exactly what I was thinking, thank you. And in the future we might have other planets to send our probes to. An aeroshell would be great. Also, have you thought about a double-length fuel tank? Not neccicary by any means, but still nice.
I\'d like that aeroshell and parachute, Mun sample returns would be awesome.
Looks amazing

That looks nice, yessir.

Will you make the sample return capsule also the command module? So that we can follow it trough reentry. Finally we can follow phobos-grunt ( if it had worked )

That looks nice, yessir.

Will you make the sample return capsule also the command module? So that we can follow it trough reentry. Finally we can follow phobos-grunt ( if it had worked )

It already is a command module.
Don\'t get me wrong, but when will be the next update? :\'(

Don\'t get me wrong, but when will be the next update? :\'(

Hopefully today.

Hopefully today.

8)

Hopefully today.

Sweet. Love your parts man.
Going to add a spherical heat shield which can encapsulate small landers. Not for this version though.
